game.name: 02 - File Manager
game.desc: MC File Manager. A keyboard is required!

game.name: 05 - install drastic
game.desc: Download and install Drastic, internet is required!

game.name: 08 - send logs
game.desc: Use this to get a URL that you can share when asking for help

game.name: 11 - Copy USB roms to device
game.desc: Easily copy ROMS from any external device to the SD/MMC where EmuELEC is installed

game.name: 12 - Show last emuelec
game.desc: Display the last emuelec.log on screen to debug game launching problems

game.name: 13 - Launch Terminal
game.desc: Start a terminal, a keybord is required!
